name: ZYNET
description:
Imprisoned deep in ZYNET, an unexpected ally will grant you the power to take control of your destiny.



How you will escape ZYNET:
  • To move and fight you will toss your discs with quick reflexes and deadly accuracy
  • To build your score multiplier and maximize your destruction you will maneuver your discs with perfectly timed swipes
  • To keep your momentum going you will dodge and punch away everything in your path
  • To unlock your true potential you will gain the ability to take control of anything you come across and will bash or launch it into oblivion
  • To earn the power needed to traverse through ZYNET you will destroy anything and everything with ludicrous speed



Early Access currently has 14 unique levels taking roughly between 4 to 6 hours for a single play through. Both the star power system and global leaderboards will reward you for many more hours of play.
